providence.neighborhoods: Downtown, Federal Hill, College Hill, Wayland, Fox Point, East Side, West End
providence.meetingHighlights: State capital recovery with meetings throughout metro; strong Brown University and RISD presence; Federal Hill Italian heritage.
providence.transitInfo: RIPTA bus service; T.F. Green Airport (PVD); Amtrak service.

warwick.neighborhoods: Warwick Neck, Oakland Beach, Conimicut, Apponaug, Hillsgrove
warwick.meetingHighlights: Suburban recovery community; Oakland Beach waterfront meetings; airport-area groups.
warwick.transitInfo: RIPTA buses; T.F. Green Airport (PVD) located in Warwick; I-95 access.

cranston.neighborhoods: Edgewood, Garden City, Knightsville, Western Cranston
cranston.meetingHighlights: Third-largest Rhode Island city recovery; diverse suburban meetings; strong Italian-American community presence.
cranston.transitInfo: RIPTA bus connections; close to Providence and PVD Airport; I-95 access.

pawtucket.neighborhoods: Downtown Pawtucket, Darlington, Fairlawn, Quality Hill
pawtucket.meetingHighlights: Historic mill city recovery; working-class traditions; border city serving RI and Massachusetts.
pawtucket.transitInfo: RIPTA buses; close to Providence; I-95 corridor; Pawtucket/Central Falls commuter rail.
